title: Dark Horse Presents: All 54 Covers, ToCs + Miscellanea (2011-14)
description:
This is what's left of the 36-issue 2011-2014 incarnation of the "Dark Horse Presents" anthology, after pruning everything either serialized or (IMO) superfluous.

In other words, these are all of the covers (which means three each for the first 4, two each for the following 10, and one each for the last 22 issues), the table of contents pages, and a handful of wonderful short stories, pin-ups, and other miscellanea which likely won't ever be reprinted elsewhere.

It's meant for those who, like me, like to keep the covers and ToCs for record-keeping purposes while freeing up the 4+ GBs of disk space which the corresponding full releases would consume, given that the bulk of the contents have by now been re-published in formats more convenient for reading and more suitable for the long term.
